DOC.brief_summary: This study is an open-label extension allowing patients who have completed Protocol MNTX 301 to continue to receive SC MNTX.
DOC.brief_title: Open-Label Treatment Extension of Protocol MNTX 301
DOC.criteria: 1. Completion of protocol MNTX 301; DoubleBlind Treatment and OpenLabel Treatment 2. Negative pregnancy test 1. Women who are pregnant and/or nursing 2. Any concurrent experimental drug therapy 3. Evidence of fecal impaction 4. Clinically significant active diverticular disease
